# Terraform AWS EKS Module


#!/bin/bash
set -ex
B64_CLUSTER_
API_SERVER_URL=https://B07DCBE7DF9A5F413CC42ADC3240A941.yl4.us-east-1.eks.amazonaws.com
K8S_CLUSTER_DNS_IP=172.20.0.10
/etc/eks/bootstrap.sh prod-noc-aws-eks --kubelet-extra-args '--node-labels=eks.amazonaws.com/nodegroup-image=ami-0193ebf9573ebc9f7,eks.amazonaws.com/capacityType=ON_DEMAND,eks.amazonaws.com/nodegroup=ng_1' --b64-cluster-ca $B64_CLUSTER_CA --apiserver-endpoint $API_SERVER_URL --dns-cluster-ip $K8S_CLUSTER_DNS_IP


kubernetes.io/cluster/prod-noc-aws-eks
owned

shared
